alert.note: Alert for Scotts Bluff National Monument, Wildcat Hills (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 22 at 2:05PM CST until December 22 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR SOUTHWESTERN FWZ 313 FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY THIS AFTERNOON AND WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 313...... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zone 313. * WIND...West wind 15 to 20 mph with gusts to 30 to 35 mph. * HUMIDITY...8 to 12 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Scotts Bluff National Monument, Wildcat Hills
